text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I call Narita Brian over so I can give her<n>some fan
mail.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Si eso es todo, me voy.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
It's my letter. What I do with it is my<n>business,
right?
choice_data_list:
Promise that you won't just throw it away, at
least!

Promise that you won't just throw it away, at
least!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
I'm just not going to read it here. That's<n>all I
meant.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Nunca tiraría una carta de un fan...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Narita Brian carefully puts the fan letter<n>in her
pocket, then leaves brusquely.
